title: Log in
name: Login
description: Checks the given credentials and returns an authentication token

title: Sign up
name: Sign_up
description:
User signup

  • The email address and username must be unique
  • The password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least a number and a letter

400.description: The email, username or password is missing
The password must be at least 6 characters long and contain a letter and a number

title: Delete
name: DeleteGroup
description:
Delete a group

  • The authenticated user must be part of that group

403.description: Authenticated user if not part of that group

title: Show
name: GetGroup
description:
Request a group's info

  • The authenticated user must be part of that group

403.description: Authenticated user is not part of that group

title: Index
name: GetGroups
description: Request a list of all groups the user is in

title: Update
name: PatchGroup
description:
Update an existing group

  • The authenticated user must be part of that group
  • The name must be at least 3 characters long
  • There must be at least 2 members

403.description: Authenticated user is not part of that group

title: Create
name: PostGroup
description:
Create a new group

  • The name must be at least 3 characters long
  • There must be at least 2 members
  • If the authenticated user is not listed in the members, it is automatically added

400.description: One of the mandatory parameters is missing

title: Delete
name: DeleteMeal
description: Delete a meal

title: Show
name: GetMeal
description: Request a meal's info

examples.title: Response example

title: Index
name: GetMeals
description: Request a list of meals

examples.title: Response example

title: Update
name: PatchMeal
description: Update an existing meal

title: Create
name: PostMeal
description:
Create a new meal

  • All participants must be members of the group
  • The date must be in the future

400.description: Participants are not all members of this group

title: Delete
name: DeleteRecipe
description:
Delete a recipe

  • The authenticated user must be the author of the recipe

title: Filter
name: FilterRecipes
description:
Request a list of recipes, filtered by

  • group
    • Shows the recipes that have been added to the given group
    • Requires groupId
  • author
    • Shows the recipes by the given author
    • Requires authorId
  • current user
    • Shows the recipes that the current user has rated
  • matching
    • Shows the max. 3 recipes that match best the participating users ratings
    • Requires groupId and participants

examples.title: Response example

400.description: One of the requested parameters is missing

title: Show
name: GetRecipe
description: Request a recipe's info

examples.title: Response example
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "_id": "5be01b75570f034068fc97af",
    "authorId": "5bdffb3d53618745c0bba83e",
    "name": "Werewolf soup",
    "description": "A witcher delicacy! Juste take the eyes and paws of your freshly killed werewolf and boil them in orange juice.",
    "imageUrl": "//cdn.myapp.net/img/jhsdfo4837f.jpg",
    "servings": 4,
    "ratings": []
}

title: Index
name: GetRecipes
description: Request a list of recipes, paginated, with a max. of 5 recipes per page

examples.title: Response example

title: Update
name: PatchRecipe
description:
Update an existing recipe

  • Only the author can update properties other than the rating
  • Users can only update their own rating

examples.title: Response example
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "_id": "5be01b75570f034068fc97af",
    "authorId": "5bdffb3d53618745c0bba83e",
    "name": "Werewolf soup",
    "description": "A witcher delicacy! Juste take the eyes and paws of your freshly killed werewolf and boil them in orange juice.",
    "imageUrl": "//cdn.myapp.net/img/jhsdfo4837f.jpg",
    "servings": 4,
    "ratings": [],
}

403.description: Non-author user is trying to edit the recipe

title: Create
name: PostRecipe
description:
Create a new recipe

  • The authenticated user will be used as author
  • The name must be at least 3 characters long
  • The servings amount must be >= 1

examples.title: Request example
Response example
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "_id": "5be01b75570f034068fc97af",
    "authorId": "5bdffb3d53618745c0bba83e",
    "name": "Werewolf soup",
    "description": "A witcher delicacy! Juste take the eyes and paws of your freshly killed werewolf and boil them in orange juice.",
    "imageUrl": "//cdn.myapp.net/img/jhsdfo4837f.jpg",
    "servings": 4,
    "ratings": [],
}

400.description: One of the mandatory parameters is missing

title: Delete
name: DeleteUser
description:
Delete a user

  • The authenticated user can only delete itself

title: Show
name: GetUser
description: Request a user's info

title: Index
name: GetUsers
description: Request a list of users

title: Update
name: PatchUser
description:
Update an existing user

  • The authenticated user can only update itself
  • The password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least a number and a letter

403.description: Authenticated user is not allowed to do this
